content.p: Discover more about the services available to you, including: admissions, accommodation, disability support, courses, placements, sport and fitness, libraries and more. We can help you pick from over 300 courses across 54 subjects. Browse our online prospectus for 2025. Applying Interested in undergraduate study at Nottingham? Here's our guide to submitting your application. Accommodation Get familiar with your university halls - from where to collect parcels to how to do laundry Scholarships and bursaries Discover information that may help you fund your study at the University of Nottingham.
